function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective face coverings and masks may lead to high outward particle emission rates during speaking and coughing, increasing the risk of virus-laden aerosols and droplets transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagious disease transmission within built environments.","Mitigation":"Use of effective face coverings and masks, proper fit and usage, and adherence to guidelines on emission control during expiratory activities.","Technologies":"High filtration efficiency masks, proper mask fit testing, and improved mask design to reduce particle emission.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in crowded indoor spaces.","Owner":"Public health authorities, mask manufacturers, employers implementing workplace safety measures."},{"Description":"Inefficient use of face shields for blocking transmission of cough-generated aerosol particles, leading to increased risk of virus transmission.","Impact":"Reduced protection against contagious disease transmission from cough-generated aerosol particles.","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of more effective face coverings and masks for source control, and provide guidelines on the appropriate use of face shields in conjunction with other protective measures.","Technologies":"Improved face shield design, combined use with high filtration masks, and education on proper face shield usage.","People":"Healthcare workers, individuals in close contact with infected individuals, general public.","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare institutions, employers implementing workplace safety protocols."}]}
